main event: A lieutenant and a civilian observed a cylindrical object hovering at an altitude of 2,000 feet near McClellan AFB.
interesting points: The object was described as silver gray in color and approximately 30-200 feet in diameter.,The object turned in a northerly direction and moved at incredible speed, disappearing quickly.,The sighting lasted approximately 2 minutes.,The weather was clear with unlimited visibility at the time of the observation.,No other aircraft were in the vicinity of the object, and no reflections from the sun were seen.
sighted object: cylindrical object, possibly a balloon or aircraft
